about.title: About Us
about.description: PURITY Fashion Studio Philosophy and Methodology

philosophy.title: Our Philosophy
philosophy.paragraph1: We believe that style is not just about clothes. It's a way of self-expression, confidence, and comfort in your own skin. PURITY was created for those who value quality, minimalism, and an individual approach.
philosophy.paragraph2: Our mission is to help you discover your unique style that reflects your personality and suits your lifestyle.

methodology.title: Our Methodology
methodology.subtitle: Four steps to the perfect style

step1.title: Consultation
step1.description: We get to know you, your lifestyle, preferences, and style goals.

step2.title: Analysis
step2.description: We determine your color type, body type, and style direction.

step3.title: Strategy
step3.description: We develop a personal wardrobe and shopping strategy.

step4.title: Implementation
step4.description: We bring the plan to life: shopping, outfit selection, building a capsule wardrobe.

quality.title: Quality
quality.description: We choose only the best materials and brands.

individuality.title: Individuality
